text: Egha a kamaghɨn dei, “Nɨ na ateghtɨ kɨ Filistiaba ko aremeka.” Egha a bar uan gavgaviba sara guarir akɨnimning adugha zuima dɨpenim irɨ. Dɨpenim dɨpɨrigha ira Filistiabar atriviba ko, gumazamizir igharazir an aven itiba sara me gisɨn ira me mɨsoghezɨ, me bar ariaghire. Ezɨ gumazamizir bar avɨrim Samson ko ariaghire, men dɨbobonim, an angamɨra ikia mɨsoghezɨ gumazibar dɨbobonim gafira.
